metadata.title: CVE-2018-21035 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In Qt through 5.14.1, the WebSocket implementation accepts up to 2GB forframes and 2GB for messages. Smaller limits cannot be configured. Thismakes it easier for attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption).

criterions.comment: qtwebsockets-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
